entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
